mapper.select: select charge.charge_id, charge.charge_money, charge.charge_money_now, charge.charge_debt,charge.charge_debt_return,charge.create_time,charge.company_id,charge.status_code ,company.company_name from sys_charge_details as charge left join sys_company as company on charge.company_id=company_id where charge.status_code!=2 and charge.charge_id = #{chargeId}
select charge_id from sys_charge_details where status_code!=2 and week_of_year = #{weekOfYear} and year=#{year} and company_id=#{companyId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_charge_details (charge_money, charge_money_now, charge_debt, charge_debt_return,company_id,create_time,week_of_year,year) VALUES (#{chargeMoney},#{chargeMoneyNow},#{chargeDebt},#{chargeDebtReturn},#{companyId},#{createTime},#{weekOfYear},#{year})
